desc: Redy beverages is a CBD infused seltzer used to help you feel refreshed. If you've had a long stressful day from work, a hard lift at the gym, or you just want to relax - Redy is the drink for you. Drink Redy today.

layout.text: Redy is a low-calorie, non-psychoactive, CBD infused beverage with supplemented vitamins including B12 to help you feel alert, and Redy for your day
